about_the_game:
Recursive Riftfall is a game about exploring exotic dungeons for loot to power your ship and yourself. Each dungeon has it’s own themes which will determine the equipment you take and how to you tackle it’s challenges.


  • Multiplayer – Play with as many people as the host’s network can handle. Dungeon size, difficulty, and resources dynamically adjust to suit the current number of players.
  • Proximity Voice Chat – The classic feature is here and well-integrated. Traps, sprawling dungeons, radios, and co-op puzzles all cater to endless memorable experiences.
  • Singleplayer – Like the challenge or the solitude? Play alone in a mode adjusted to suit solo play.
  • Equipment – Use the right tool for the job! Scanners, radios, jump boots, cloaking devices, and many more provide ample ways to tackle endless challenges.
  • Procedural Dungeons – Dungeons are diverse and exotic, each with their own gameplay themes. You’ll encounter them in waves – work together to figure out a dungeon group’s main dangers to be as well-prepared as possible.
  • Obstacles – The dungeon could have a confusing labyrinthian layout, or lots of verticality. It could have hidden pushers ready to plunge you into the abyss, or flamethrowers ready to burn you to a crisp. It could have doors that require teamwork to open. It could be extra dark, or the floor could be made of ice. And on top of all those possible dangers, there are the Obeloids.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5, 3rd gen (or equivalent)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1000 series or AMD Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Explore dungeons, collect loot, and avoid dangers in this exotic looter! Play solo or with as many as the host can handle. Power your ship and yourselves with the resources you find to ensure your continued survival.
